posts.post_title: WTB: Lower Grade Cobbs - All Poses
posts.post_content: Looking for lower grade with good eye appeal. Not concerned about which back and back damage is ok, too. Let me know what you have. Thanks!
Still looking. Graded or raw. Thanks
Bump. Still looking. Would consider a Bat Off in a little higher grade. Thanks
